name: BIOS OVERFLOW
description:
Overwhelm your opponent's computer with interference by sending your interference back to him.

The classic pinball mechanics of pinball put back into the confrontation between players who are exchanging several balls at the same time.

In BIOS Overflow, a ball rarely arrives alone.
Challenge your reflexes and your sense of priorities to avoid losing balls and send them back to your opponent.

CONTROLS : 

A & D for left player

Left arrow & right arrow for the right player.
